title: Navarathna Pushpa Jhumka: A Royal Bloom of Tradition
features: Exquisite floral design embodying traditional South Indian aesthetics, featuring a delicate arrangement of Navarathna gemstones set in a kundan style. The emerald leaf cluster top adds a touch of nature. Fine engraving detailing on the gold creates a rich, antique-inspired look. The intricate setting highlights the vibrant colors of the gemstones.
colors: and Sparkling White Diamonds. A classic and auspicious South Indian color palette.
occasions: and half-saree functions. Also suitable for grand festivals like Ugadi and Sankranthi
or any occasion where you want to make a statement.
description: This Navarathna Jhumka combines traditional South Indian craftsmanship with timeless elegance. The use of auspicious Navarathna gemstones ensures prosperity and good fortune. Handcrafted by skilled artisans in Hyderabad, this piece showcases exceptional detail and enduring quality. Its unique design makes it a cherished heirloom, passed down through generations.
